content.text:
# Draft:Saad Anwar

----
Saad Anwar is an Indian entrepreneur based in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia.
Early life
Saad Anwar was born in Lucknow, India. He moved to Saudi Arabia at a young age and began his entrepreneurial career in his teenage years. He built his business presence independently, without inherited wealth or family business connections.
Career
In 2022, following reforms in Saudi Arabia’s foreign investment regulations, Anwar became one of the youngest Indian expatriates to register as a foreign investor in the Kingdom at the age of 24. His business interests span contracting, manpower, logistics, and trading. His success story is often cited as a symbol of entrepreneurial integration between India and Saudi Arabia.
Premium Residency
In December 2024, Saad Anwar was awarded Saudi Premium Residency — the Kingdom’s long-term visa that allows expatriates to live, work, and own property without a sponsor. He was among the youngest recipients at the time.
